content:
Hi Are there any ongoing updates to the LP (https://zulip.com) design?
Currently, the main color of our logo is blue, but there are many green color items on this web page.
I thought it would be good to apply blue to the site as well.
What do you think? Should it be green as a tradition...?

Thank you!
I look forward to seeing your new web page design. :laughing:
